name: Soul Strand
description:
Soul Strand is a game based on cooperation

You play as kate, a young girl who loves exploring the unknown.

And one day she found a strange house and she felt like the house is calling her.

You Also Play as luke a soul who is trapped in the house

Uncover the house secrets with kate and luke by solving puzzles and exploring the house.

---------------------------------------------------------

A Game Developed By Mohamed Arafa

Artists : Nada Mahmoud and Sara Ashraf

=====================================

Mohamed Arafa : https://mohamed-arafa.itch.io

Nada Mahmoud : https://itch.io/profile/melodyo

Sara Ashraf : https://itch.io/profile/sara-ashraf
